references.paper_title: Recovering intrinsic scene characteristics from images
references.reason: This is an early seminal work that introduced the concept of intrinsic images, which is central to the data-driven relighting approach discussed in the paper.
This paper introduced a large-scale dataset of intrinsic images, which is crucial for evaluating and comparing different relighting algorithms.
